Articles.Content:
In the great green field, there was a white, rising plume, and a spinning Nav ball, pointing up to the Mun.

There rose a wobbly gray rocket that was raining down sprockets, and there were too many stages with red flashing gauges.

There was a slow RCS turn and a really long burn, there was Jeb, Bob, and Bill, screaming from orbit to a hill.

There was thrust and a gray gust, as a lander kicked up dust. There was a ladder and some boots, and three kerbals in their suits.

And a bright Kerbol glare rising over the buttes.

Goodnight field. Goodnight Mun.

Goodnight Jeb, flying up to the Mun.

Goodnight Nav Ball and the white, rising plume.

Goodnight stages and goodnight gauges.

Goodnight turn and goodnight burn.

Goodnight Bob, Jeb, and Bill, goodnight orbit and goodnight hill.

Goodnight thrust, goodnight gust, and goodnight lander, kicking up dust.

Goodnight ladder and goodnight boots

Goodnight spaceship and kerbals in space suits

Goodnight stars and Kerbol's glare

Goodnight Kerbals everywhere

There was thrust and a gray gust, as a lander kicked up dust. There was a ladder and some boots, and three kerbals in their suits.

And a bright Kerbol glare rising over the buttes.

Goodnight field. Goodnight Mun.

Goodnight Jeb, flying up to the Mun.

Goodnight Nav Ball and the white, rising plume.

Goodnight stages and goodnight gauges.

Goodnight turn and goodnight burn.

Goodnight Bob, Jeb, and Bill, goodnight orbit and goodnight hill.

Goodnight thrust, goodnight gust, and goodnight lander, kicking up dust.

Goodnight ladder and goodnight boots

Goodnight spaceship and kerbals in space suits

Goodnight stars and Kerbol's glare

Goodnight Kerbals everywhere

Amazing Poem
Thank you. I just wish I'd had time to finish the illustrations. Maybe someday.
